newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: European Coal, Steel Cty issues 5-yr Navigator.
newsitem.headline: European Coal, Steel Cty issues 5-yr Navigator.

text.p: The European Coal and Steel Community has launched a 16.3 billion escudo five-year Navigator indexed to six-month Lisbor minus 15 basis points, joint lead managers Banco Portugues de Investimento, Caixa Geral de Depositos and Banco Espirito Santo said.

The issue is at par and is conducted under the EMTN programme of the European Coal and Steel Community. Funds from the operation are aimed at financing Portuguese companies, a statement said. ISSUER: European Coal and Steel Community AMOUNT: 16.3 BLN ESC INTEREST RATE: 6-mth Lisbor minus 15 bps SUBSCRIPTION AND PAYMENT DATE: 26/6/1997 SUBSCRIPTION PRICE: 100 pct REIMBURSEMENT DATE: 26/6/2002 REIMBURSEMENT PRICE: 100 pct RATING: AAA (S&P), Aaa (Moody's) DENOMINATION: 100,000 escudos ADMISSION TO: Luxembourg bourse NATIONAL PAYING AGENT: Banco Portugues de Investimento, SA LEADERS: BPI, Caixa Feral de Depositos, BES.
